meta.article_title: November 7, 2016 - Three Ways to Play the Forehand

debutant.nom: Pull Back Leg Back for Forehands
debutant.description: Quickly pull the leg back, rotating the body around, to get into a forehand stance.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Pull Back Leg Back for Forehands
exercices_complementaires.description: Quickly pull the leg back, rotating the body around, to get into a forehand stance.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Play Forehands with a Neutral Stance
exercices_complementaires.description: Rotate the body at the hips and waist, without pulling back leg, to play forehand.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Play Backhands with a Forehand Stance
exercices_complementaires.description: Play backhand with the right leg back (for righties) and then quickly transition to forehand play.
